subject: Re: [junit] Need BeforeSuite and AfterSuite functionality
msgSnippet: ... Actually, it will be run twice. ... What would this do that BeforeClass/AfterClass does not?
messageBody:
2011/2/7 Cédric Beust ♔ <cedric@...>:
> On Mon, Feb 7, 2011 at 12:36 AM, Malte Finsterwalder <
> malte@...> wrote:
>
>> Here is what I don't quite understand: Once per instance of what?
>>
>
> I suppose per instance of test class.
>
> If your suite contains ATest.class twice, the @BeforeClass methods will only
> be run once, even though there are two instances.

Actually, it will be run twice.

> Also, @BeforeSuite/@AfterSuite is a pretty common need.

What would this do that BeforeClass/AfterClass does not?

>
> --
> Cédric
>
>
